ScriptComponents.description: UI components created via Content.addXxx() methods

area.description: The local bounds of the slider

valueAsText.description: The current value formatted as text

valueSuffixString.description: The value with suffix formatted as text

skew.description: The skew factor for non-linear scaling

clicked.description: Whether the mouse button is down

hover.description: Whether the mouse is over the slider

drawLinearSlider.description: Draws a linear (horizontal, vertical, or range) style slider

area.description: The local bounds of the slider

valueAsText.description: The current value formatted as text

valueSuffixString.description: The value with suffix formatted as text

skew.description: The skew factor for non-linear scaling

valueRangeStyleMinNormalized.description: Normalized min value for range-style sliders

valueRangeStyleMaxNormalized.description: Normalized max value for range-style sliders

clicked.description: Whether the mouse button is down

hover.description: Whether the mouse is over the slider

area.description: The local bounds of the button

over.description: Whether the mouse is over the button

down.description: Whether the mouse button is down

area.description: The local bounds of the combo box

enabled.description: Whether the combo box is enabled and has items

hover.description: Whether the mouse is over or popup is active

down.description: Whether the mouse button is down

drawTableBackground.description: Draws the background of a table editor

drawTablePath.description: Draws the curve path of a table editor

drawTablePoint.description: Draws a control point on the table curve

isEdge.description: Whether this is an edge point

hover.description: Whether the mouse is over the point

clicked.description: Whether the point is being dragged

drawTableMidPoint.description: Draws a mid-point (curve control) on the table

hover.description: Whether the mouse is over the point

clicked.description: Whether the point is being dragged

drawTableRuler.description: Draws the position ruler on the table

drawSliderPackBackground.description: Draws the background of a slider pack

numSliders.description: Number of sliders in the pack

displayIndex.description: Index of next slider to display

drawSliderPackFlashOverlay.description: Draws the flash overlay for a slider in the pack

numSliders.description: Number of sliders in the pack

displayIndex.description: Index of the slider being displayed

drawSliderPackRightClickLine.description: Draws the line when right-click dragging

drawSliderPackTextPopup.description: Draws the text popup when dragging a slider

drawThumbnailBackground.description: Draws the background of an audio waveform thumbnail

drawThumbnailText.description: Draws text overlay on the thumbnail

drawThumbnailRange.description: Draws a range selection on the thumbnail

xPosition.description: The X position of the ruler

getThumbnailRenderOptions.description: Returns render options for the thumbnail (non-drawing callback)

drawMidiDropper.description: Draws a MIDI file drag and drop component

externalDrag.description: Whether external drag is in progress

createPresetBrowserIcons.description: Creates custom icons for the preset browser (returns Path)

drawPresetBrowserBackground.description: Draws the main background of the preset browser

drawPresetBrowserDialog.description: Draws modal dialogs in the preset browser

drawPresetBrowserColumnBackground.description: Draws the background of a column in the preset browser

text.description: Empty text to display when no items

drawPresetBrowserListItem.description: Draws an item in the preset browser list

drawPresetBrowserSearchBar.description: Draws the search bar in the preset browser

drawPresetBrowserTag.description: Draws a tag in the preset browser

drawKeyboardBackground.description: Draws the background of the MIDI keyboard

drawWhiteNote.description: Draws a white key on the MIDI keyboard

hover.description: Whether mouse is over the key

drawBlackNote.description: Draws a black key on the MIDI keyboard

hover.description: Whether mouse is over the key

drawAhdsrBackground.description: Draws the background of an AHDSR envelope graph

drawAhdsrBall.description: Draws the ball indicating current envelope position

drawFlexAhdsrBackground.description: Draws the background of a Flex AHDSR envelope graph

drawFlexAhdsrText.description: Draws text information on the envelope

drawFilterBackground.description: Draws the background of a filter graph

drawFilterPath.description: Draws the filter frequency response curve

drawFilterGridLines.description: Draws the grid lines on the filter graph

drag.description: Whether the handle is being dragged

drawAnalyserBackground.description: Draws the background of an audio analyser

drawAnalyserPath.description: Draws the analyser path (FFT, oscilloscope, etc.)

drawAnalyserGrid.description: Draws the grid lines on the analyser

drawWavetableBackground.description: Draws the background of a wavetable display

drawWavetablePath.description: Draws a single waveform path in the wavetable

tableIndex.description: Index of this table in the wavetable

peaks.description: Current peak values for each channel

maxPeaks.description: Maximum peak values for each channel

getModulatorDragData.description: Returns position data for modulation drag UI (non-drawing callback)

sliderBounds.description: Bounds of the slider in parent

drawModulationDragBackground.description: Draws the background of a modulation drag popup

drawModulationDragger.description: Draws a single modulation source dragger

Global.description: LAF functions that apply globally or to system UI elements

drawAlertWindow.description: Draws the background of an alert/dialog window

getAlertWindowMarkdownStyleData.description: Returns style data for markdown text in alert windows (non-drawing callback)

drawAlertWindowIcon.description: Draws the icon for an alert window

drawPopupMenuBackground.description: Draws the background of a popup menu

drawPopupMenuItem.description: Draws a single popup menu item

isSectionHeader.description: Whether this is a section header

hasSubMenu.description: Whether the item has a submenu

getIdealPopupMenuItemSize.description: Returns ideal size for a popup menu item (non-drawing callback)

drawDialogButton.description: Draws a button in a dialog window

drawNumberTag.description: Draws a macro control number tag

drawTableRowBackground.description: Draws the background of a table row

drawTableCell.description: Draws a single cell in a table

drawTableHeaderBackground.description: Draws the background of a table header
